hypothesis_content.title: Neutral-to-Bull Regime Transition via Volatility Compression Breakout
hypothesis_content.statement: When BTC trades in a NEUTRAL regime with 20-day realized volatility dropping below 40% (compression) and daily RSI(14) holds between 40-60 for 5+ days, a breakout above the 20-day Bollinger Band upper band on >1.5x average volume signals a transition to BULL regime with 85% probability of 8%+ continuation over next 5 days.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Neutral regimes with low volatility represent accumulation phases. Breakouts from compression with volume confirmation often precede sustained bull moves as sidelined capital enters. RSI neutrality prevents overbought/oversold false signals.
entry_conditions: BTC daily RSI(14) between 40-60 for ≥5 consecutive days
BTC price closes > 20-day Bollinger Band upper band (2 std)

exit_conditions.take_profit: 8% gain from entry OR regime transitions to BULL (confidence > 75%)

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: Breakout fails to sustain >2 days OR immediate reversal below breakout level with volume < average
